description:
Joint Decision and Verification Order required for the street numbering of the post and access point adjacent to 66-68 Kensington High Street W8 4PE and the internal numbering of the 11 self-contained residential units spanning over the First, Second and Third Floors above 62-70 Kensington High street W8 4PE, linked to Planning application PP/12/04344, as follows:

66A Kensington High Street W8 4PE

Flat 1, First Floor, 66A Kensington High Street W8 4PE
Flat 2, First Floor, 66A Kensington High Street W8 4PE
Flat 3, First Floor, 66A Kensington High Street W8 4PE
Flat 4, First Floor, 66A Kensington High Street W8 4PE
Flat 5, First Floor, 66A Kensington High Street W8 4PE
Flat 6, Second Floor, 66A Kensington High Street W8 4PE
Flat 7, Second Floor, 66A Kensington High Street W8 4PE
Flat 8, Second Floor, 66A Kensington High Street W8 4PE
Flat 9, Second Floor, 66A Kensington High Street W8 4PE
Flat 10, Second Floor, 66A Kensington High Street W8 4PE
Flat 11, Third Floor, 66A Kensington High Street W8 4PE
